desc_session_trigger: Chatwiki external service. Trigger workflow when user starts a session.
msg_multi_modal_desc: When enabled, supports user input of text + image messages. The user's text message will still be output as the question variable, and an additional variable question_multiple will be added.
tip_question_multiple: "question_multiple" is an object array containing user text and image messages. Example:
tip_question_multiple_json: "question_multiple" is an object array containing user text and image messages. Example:
tip_sample_text: Text corresponding to the sample audio, must match the audio content, and end with punctuation
tip_sample_text_2: Text corresponding to the sample audio, must match the audio content, and end with punctuation
tip_recognition_test_text: Preview test parameters, limited to 1000 characters. The model will use the cloned voice to read this text and return a preview audio link.
tip_text_2: Preview test parameters, limited to 1000 characters. The model will use the cloned voice to read this text and return a preview audio link.
tip_small_language_recognition: Whether to enhance recognition of specified small languages and dialects. Default value is null, can be set to auto to let the model decide automatically.
tip_test_audio_model: Specify the speech model for synthesizing test audio. This field is required when providing the text field.
tip_noise_reduction: Audio cloning parameter, whether to enable noise reduction
tip_volume_normalization: Audio cloning parameter, whether to enable volume normalization
tip_audio_rhythm_mark: Whether to add audio rhythm mark at the end of synthesized test audio
